com.intel.jndn.utils

Interface DynamicServer

  • All Superinterfaces:
    net.named_data.jndn.OnInterest, Runnable, Server
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    SimpleServer

    public interface DynamicServer
extends Server
    Defines the API for a Server producing Data packets dynamically; in other words, when an Interest arrives, this server will run a callback to determine what packet to send back. As good practice, keep callback methods as short as possible.
    Author:
    Andrew Brown

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void respondUsing(RespondWithData callback)
      Set the callback method to run when an Interest packet is passed to this server.

      • Methods inherited from interface com.intel.jndn.utils.server.Server

        addPipelineStage, getPrefix, getRegisteredPrefixId

      • Methods inherited from interface java.lang.Runnable

        run

      • Methods inherited from interface net.named_data.jndn.OnInterest

        onInterest

    • Method Detail

      • respondUsing

        void respondUsing(RespondWithData callback)
                  throws IOException
        Set the callback method to run when an Interest packet is passed to this server. This method should either return a Data packet that satisfies the Interest or throw an Exception to avoid sending. Calling this method a second time should replace the callback.
        Parameters:
        callback - the callback instance
        Throws:
        IOException - if the server fails to register a prefix
